headline: Is Smucker Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Slide and DCF Upside Signals?
summary: If you have been wondering whether J. M. Smucker at around $98 a share is a bargain or a value trap, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack that in plain English. The stock has slipped recently, down about 2.8% over the last week, 5.7% over the past month, and roughly 11.4% year to date, leaving it about 6.5% lower than a year ago and almost flat over five years. Those moves sit against a backdrop of shifting investor sentiment toward defensive consumer staples, with markets...
